Elon Musk: As the CEO of SpaceX and Tesla, Elon Musk has revolutionized the industries of space exploration and electric cars. Swapping places with him would give me unparalleled access to the cutting-edge technology and innovative thinking that have made him a visionary leader in these fields. I could learn from his ability to envision the future and make it a reality, and I could also gain insight into the challenges and opportunities of being a successful entrepreneur and innovator.

Malala Yousafzai: Malala is a Nobel Peace Prize laureate and education activist who has dedicated her life to fighting for the rights of girls and women around the world. Swapping places with her would give me a unique perspective on the struggles and triumphs of social justice movements, and I could learn from her unwavering commitment to fighting for what is right. I could also gain insight into the ways in which education can be a powerful tool for social change, and I could learn from her ability to inspire and mobilize others to take action.

Lin-Manuel Miranda: Lin-Manuel Miranda is a composer, playwright, and actor who has made a significant impact on the world of theater and entertainment. Swapping places with him would give me the opportunity to learn from his creative genius and his ability to blend art and activism. I could gain insight into the ways in which art can be used to tell important stories and to inspire social change, and I could learn from his ability to bring people together through his work.

Jane Goodall: Jane Goodall is a primatologist and conservationist who is known for her groundbreaking research on chimpanzees and her tireless advocacy for animal welfare and environmental conservation. Swapping places with her would give me the opportunity to learn from her unparalleled knowledge of the natural world and her dedication to protecting it. I could gain insight into the ways in which science and activism can be used to make a positive impact on the world, and I could learn from her ability to inspire others to take action to protect the environment.
David Attenborough: David Attenborough is a naturalist and broadcaster who has spent his career sharing the wonders of the natural world with audiences around the world.
